detectors.description:
BitcoinAsia.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BitcoinAsia.sol#147-152) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[to] = balances[to].add(tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BitcoinAsia.sol#149)
